original_text: So the man looked at Peter and John. He thought that they would give him some money.
korean_text: 그가 그들에게서 무엇을 얻을까 하여 바라보거늘

sentences.original_text: So the man looked at Peter and John
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그 남자는 베드로와 요한을 쳐다보았습니다

sentences.original_text: He thought that they would give him some money
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들이 그에게 약간의 돈을 줄 것이라고 생각했습니다
